and E.PREARNGE_AMOUNT = COALESCE(R.IPOCD_AMOUNT_BEFORE, 0) + COALESCE(R.IPOCD_AMOUNT, 0)
and P.PATNT_NM like '%' || #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

and E.PREARNGE_AMOUNT > COALESCE(R.IPOCD_AMOUNT_BEFORE, 0) + COALESCE(R.IPOCD_AMOUNT, 0)
and P.PATNT_NM like '%' || #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

mapper.select: select count(rcipt_no) FROM receipt R JOIN receive E ON R.RCIV_NO = E.RCIV_NO JOIN patient P ON E.PATNT_NO = P.PATNT_NO where 1=1 and R.IPOCD_DTTM BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate}+1

SELECT P.PATNT_NM, P.PATNT_SEXDSTN, P.PATNT_RRNO1, P.PATNT_AGE, P.PATNT_ADRES1, P.PATNT_ADRES2, P.PATNT_TELNO, P.PATNT_HLTHINS_AT, E.RCIV_AT, E.RECIV_TOTAMT, E.PREARNGE_AMOUNT, COALESCE(R.IPOCD_AMOUNT_BEFORE, 0) + R.IPOCD_AMOUNT as ipocdAmountBefore, R.IPOCD_AMOUNT, E.RCIV_AMOUNT, E.PREARNGE_AMOUNT - COALESCE(R.IPOCD_AMOUNT_BEFORE, 0) - R.IPOCD_AMOUNT as missingAmount, R.IPOCD_DTTM, E.RCIV_DTTM, E.RECIV_MEMO
FROM receipt R JOIN receive E ON R.RCIV_NO = E.RCIV_NO JOIN patient P ON E.PATNT_NO = P.PATNT_NO where R.RCIPT_NO = #{rciptNo}
SELECT COUNT(R.RCIV_NO) FROM RECEIVE R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PATNT_NO = P.PATNT_NO JOIN CLINIC C ON C.CLNIC_NO = R.CLNIC_NO WHERE 1=1 AND R.RCIV_AT = 0

SELECT P.PATNT_NM, P.PATNT_SEXDSTN, P.PATNT_RRNO1, P.PATNT_AGE, P.PATNT_ADRES1, P.PATNT_ADRES2, P.PATNT_TELNO, PATNT_HLTHINS_AT, R.RCIV_NO, P.PRTCTOR_NM, P.PRTCTOR_TELNO, C.CLNIC_TIME, R.RECIV_TOTAMT, R.PREARNGE_AMOUNT, (R.PREARNGE_AMOUNT - R.RCIV_AMOUNT) as missingAmount, P.PATNT_MEMO, R.RECIV_MEMO FROM RECEIVE R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PATNT_NO = P.PATNT_NO JOIN CLINIC C ON C.CLNIC_NO = R.CLNIC_NO WHERE 1=1 AND R.RCIV_AT = 0 AND R.RCIV_NO = #{rcivNo}
